page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW-PYPE HAYES
page.content: OUR DOMESDAY BLOCK CAN BE DIVIDED INTO THREE MAIN AREAS: AREA ONE,IN THE SOUTH-WEST IS A LARGE ESTATE BUILT IN THE 1930'S MAINLY COUNCIL OWNED. AREA TWO,IN THE SOUTH-EAST IS A LARGE ESTATE BUILT IN THE I960'S WITH MAINLY COUNCIL HOUSES AND TOWER BLOCKS. AREA THREE,THE NORTH OF THE BLOCK IS MAINLY LARGE RESIDENTIAL HOUSES. AREAS ONE AND TWO CONTAIN MOST OF THE INDUSTRY.MANY OF THE FACTORIES BACK ONTO A CANAL WHICH IS VERY RARELY USED NOW.WITHIN A MILE IS THE M6 MOTORWAY SO IS A POPULAR AREA FOR INDUSTRY.AGRICULTUTHE MAIN INDUSTRY IN THE MORTH BUT VERY FEW PEOPLE WORK ON THE LAND.UNEMPLOYMENT IS HIGHEST IN THE SOUTH AREA.
